game.name: DozTroy
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: a game to let off steam for 5 minutes on your computer and release the pressure. Multiple weapons, game modes, fun. Want to destroy a spreadsheet with a minigun?
game.shortDescriptionEn: a game to let off steam for 5 minutes on your computer and release the pressure. Multiple weapons, game modes, fun. Want to destroy a spreadsheet with a minigun?
